references.paper_title: Photo tourism: exploring photo collections in 3d
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Photo Tourism and 3D scene reconstruction from multiple photos, which is foundational to the methods used in this paper for creating audio-visual scenes from real-world videos.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper presents a real-time rendering method using 3D Gaussian splatting which is directly relevant to this paper's proposed AV-Cloud framework for efficient audio-visual scene rendering.

This paper introduces a visual acoustic matching method that reconstructs spatial audio from images, which serves as a baseline approach and is compared against in this paper's proposed AV-Cloud method.

references.paper_title: AV-NeRF: Learning neural fields for real-world audio-visual scene synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes AV-NeRF, a neural rendering method for audio-visual scenes, which is a closely related work and a strong baseline for comparison with the proposed AV-Cloud method.

references.paper_title: Inras: Implicit neural representation for audio scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces a point-based method for neural audio rendering, which shares similarities with the proposed AV-Cloud method and serves as another strong baseline for comparison.
